Startup Law for Designers Supporting tagline

This presentation was given at Geekdom, a collaborative workspace/incubator for startups in San Antonio, Texas. It addresses many of the common questions that design shops and web startups encounter as they build their branding, select naming, and form a company.  I'm told a full streaming audio/video version will be available at some point, and I'll update this post if and when the Q/A portion is posted.
